mean_cn: n. 乘火车或公共汽车往返于两地之间的人，通勤者，月季票乘客
mean_en: a passenger train that is ridden primarily by passengers who travel regularly from one place to another
word_etyma: com共同+mut 改变+er[名词后缀]做某事的人→通勤者，经常乘公共车辆往返者；[交] 月季票乘客
sentence: The early morning train was full of commuters.
sentence_trans: 清晨的火车上满是通勤者。
